name: broadcastchannel
description: BroadcastChannel is a self-hosted tool leveraging the browser's BroadcastChannel API to sync real-time messages and state across tabs or windows in a simple way, suitable for lightweight data syncing.
features: Tab Synchronization: Sync messages and state across browser tabs. Real-time updates.
BroadcastChannel API: Leverages native browser API for efficiency. No external dependencies.
Lightweight: Minimal overhead for simple data syncing. Fast performance.
Real-Time: Instant message propagation across tabs. Immediate updates.
Self-Hosted: Deploy your own synchronization service. Complete control.
Simple Integration: Easy to implement in web applications. Developer-friendly.
Cross-Tab State: Share application state between windows. Unified experience.
Browser-Native: Uses standard web APIs for compatibility. No plugins needed.
